about_the_game:
Enhance five Ara: History Untold leaders (Elizabeth I, Genghis Khan, Nefertiti, Sappho and George Washington) with the Modern Leader Skin Set, featuring modern versions of their in-game costumes.

This bonus content is included with purchase of the Ara: History Untold Deluxe Edition.
detailed_description:
Enhance five Ara: History Untold leaders (Elizabeth I, Genghis Khan, Nefertiti, Sappho and George Washington) with the Modern Leader Skin Set, featuring modern versions of their in-game costumes.

This bonus content is included with purchase of the Ara: History Untold Deluxe Edition.
name: Ara: History Untold, Modern Leader Skin Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Ara: History Untold Deluxe Upgrade - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Ara: History Untold, Modern Leader Skin Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G – Intel i5-5300U
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 – Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 – Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 64 – Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
